New Records: Rahmanullah Gurbaz is the quickest of the 13 Afghanistan batters to the mark of 1000 ODI runs
Key Match Events: India won by 8 wickets (with 90 balls remaining)
Rohit Sharma and his team were prepared to adapt to various conditions as they progress through the World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma is looking to improve his aggression and increase his strike rate
Hashmatullah Shahidi emphasized the need for his batting order to score more runs
India captain Rohit Sharma is prepared to play 'horses for courses' and adapt to the conditions
Afghanistan's batting order will face a challenge from India's spin attack
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed satisfaction with the team's performance and the win
Hashmatullah Shahidi reflected on the team's performance and acknowledged the need for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Feroz Shah Kotla has seen record-breaking performances in the past, including the highest match total and fastest century
Rohit Sharma has been hitting at a better than run-a-ball strike rate in the past two years
India's batting order has been performing well, with Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli leading the charge
Others: Shubman Gill is still recovering from dengue and has not travelled with the team
R Ashwin might be replaced by Shardul Thakur in the Indian team due to the spin-friendly conditions in Delhi
